entities.name: divination exam
entities.description: The divination exam is mentioned as an event where Professor Trelawney's behavior was unusual.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is the teacher who went strange during the divination exam. She made a prediction about Voldemort's servant returning to him before midnight.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who was present during the divination exam and seemed mildly impressed by Professor Trelawney's prediction.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a character mentioned in the context of Professor Trelawney's prediction about his servant returning to him before midnight.

relationships.description: Dumbledore was mildly impressed by Professor Trelawney's prediction.
Professor Trelawney made a prediction about Voldemort's servant returning to him before midnight.
